Class Patches (stuffit archives):      Class 1 . All those boxes and wires.   Class 2 . Additive synthesis.   Class 3 . Modulation synthesis.   Class 4 . Sample playback and manipulation.   Class 5 . MIDI integration and mapping. Dealing with polyphony.   Class 6 . Filter theory and subtractive synthesis.   Class 7 . Delay lines and simple physical models.   Class 8 . Frequency domain signal processing.   Class 9 . Introduction to DAW Plug-in design.  Class 10. Midterm.   Class 11 . Polyphony and granular synthesis.  Class 12. Synaesthesia and sampling.   Class 13 . Audio-visual interaction.     Download the Pluggo Runtime for Class 10.  Download fiddle~ and PeRColate for Class 11.     Some Sounds To Play With   Cycling'74 Documentation   Max Tutorial Patches   MSP Tutorial Patches     Assignments:     Assignment 1 . Due October 19th.   Assignment 2 . Due December 7th.   Final Project Assignment . Due December 21st.

Electronic Music Synthesis: Fundamental Techniques                     Time: 45 hours Credits: 3 credits Term: Spring Instructor: Thomas Beyer An introductory course in analog electronic music synthesis. Basic concepts in the synthesis of music including generation of sound, voltage control and treatment of sound are covered. Students complete laboratory tasks on analog synthesizer modules and create a project that demonstrates the application of basic concepts.
